toolbar_full.description: Button title to open chrome full download view

toolbar_clear.description: Button title to clear all downloads

placeholder_nothing.description: Placeholder text displayed when no downloads at all

placeholder_empty.description: Placeholder text displayed when no search results

card_actions_stop.description: Button text to stop an ongoing download (will be uppercased)

card_actions_retry.description: Button text to retry an interrupted ownload (will be uppercased)

card_actions_redo.description: Button text to redo a completed download (will be uppercased)

card_actions_pause.description: Button text to pause an ongoing download (will be uppercased)

card_actions_resume.description: Button text to resume a paused download (will be uppercased)

card_actions_show.description: Button text to show (in sytem file explorer) a completed and existing download file (will be uppercased)

card_actions_open.description: Button text to open a completed and existing download file (will be uppercased)

carde_time_days.description: Text used for days on progress remaining time

carde_time_hours.description: Text used for hours on progress remaining time

carde_time_minutes.description: Text used for minutes on progress remaining time

carde_time_seconds.description: Text used for seconds on progress remaining time
